list.name: John Adams
list.text: “The GirlScript India Summit 2018 was packed with great speakers, valuable information, and many learning opportunities for beginners in technology.”

list.name: Paul George
list.text: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
